author: dreid
msg: The beginning of mmap support for APR.  Still early days but what's here
has been tested and seems to work.  Next is the ability to read/send an

author: rbb
msg: Fix the error codes so they are more portable.  Each OS can now define their
own starting error value for APR extensions.

author: rbb
msg: Fix mod_cgi so it works on Unix systems.  We need to be VERY careful
about calling ap_cleanups_for_exec now.  There is really no reason to call
this from outside of APR, unless you are specifically doing a fork/exec.
If you use ap_create_process, it will call ap_cleanups_for_exec for you
in the right spot now.  Also cleaned up some of the code because it helped
with debugging.  We need better error messages in mod_cgi now.

author: stoddard
msg: Should be able to issue ap_put_os_file() with a NULL context provided struct file_t exists

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: on closing buffered file, write unwritten data in the buffer.
